dict.acceptation: 亲身参与，亲身经历；感受；发现；

sent.orig: Experience: 2-of engineering experience in power plant, air pollution control system, or process plant design experience.
sent.trans: 经验：至少两年以上工业经验。具有电厂，空气污染控制系统或设计院经验者优先。

sent.orig: Identical experience and introspective experience further deepen direct experience.
sent.trans: 认同体验和反思体验是对直接体验的进一步深化和提升。

sent.orig: You may entitle this section Relevant Experience, Business Experience, Leadership Experience, etc.
sent.trans: 你可以将这段命名为相关经历、工作经验、领导经验等。

sent.orig: With over 3 years experience in logistics industrial and over 2 year experience in sales function.
sent.trans: 3年以上第叁方物流行业从业经验，2年以上销售及相关岗位经验，有汽车制造行业物流服务从业背景优先。

sent.orig: Setbacks can help you accumulate experience, and experience can, in return, enrich you mind.
sent.trans: 挫折可以帮助你积累经验，经验反过来能够丰富智慧。
